trans-unit.source: Describes the behavior that caused a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Okozó működését mutatja be egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"> </xref> eseményt egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: The page buttons are not visible as buttons, but they occupy the space between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> controls on either end of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.
trans-unit.target: A lap gombok gombként nem láthatók el, de a közötti <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>és a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>vezérlőket vagy a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> végén lévő</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> foglalják

trans-unit.source: The user clicks a page button when clicking the left mouse button between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>.
trans-unit.target: A felhasználó egy lap gombra kattint, amikor kattintson a bal oldali egérgombbal az között <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>és egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: The result of this action is to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb> in the direction of the page button.
trans-unit.target: Ez a művelet eredménye nem helyezhető át a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>a lapra ugró gomb irányában.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the effect of the page buttons, see the descriptions of the LargeIncrement and LargeDecrement members.
trans-unit.target: A lap gombjainak hatásának kapcsolatos további információkért lásd: a LargeIncrement és LargeDecrement tagok leírását.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, including the page buttons.
trans-unit.target: Az alábbi ábrán a elemeinek egy <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, beleértve a lap gombok.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: ![The different parts of a ScrollBar](~/add/media/scrollbarpagebutton.png "The different parts of a ScrollBar")
trans-unit.target: ![A görgetősáv különböző részeinek](~/add/media/scrollbarpagebutton.png "a görgetősáv különböző részeinek")

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> was dragged to a new position and is now no longer being dragged by the user.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> húzta lett egy új helyre, és van most már nem húzott a felhasználó által.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum*> position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> helyezi át a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum*>Helyezze a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the CTRL+HOME keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: Függőleges <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a mozgás akkor történik, ha a CTRL + HOME billentyűk lenyomásakor.

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToTopCommand"></xref> in a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToLeftEndCommand"></xref> in a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A mozgás megfelel-e egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToTopCommand"> </xref> függőleges <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> és egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToLeftEndCommand"> </xref> vízszintes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, to the left for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or upward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> áthelyezése egy megadott távolságra értéke alapján <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, vízszintes balra <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> vagy felfelé függőleges <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button that is above the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, or when the PAGE UP key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageUpCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Függőleges <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, mozgást következik be az oldalra, amely felett az <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> lenyomásakor, vagy ha a lapon fel kulcs nélkül, és megfelel-e egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageUpCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button to the left of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageLeftCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A vízszintes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a mozgás akkor történik, ha a lap bal oldalán gombra a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> nélkül, és megfelel-e egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageLeftCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a specified distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, to the right for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or downward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> áthelyezése egy megadott távolságra értéke alapján <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>, a vízszintes jobb <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> vagy lefelé függőleges <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button that is below the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, or when the PAGE DOWN key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageDownCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Függőleges <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a mozgás akkor történik, amikor a lapra ugró gomb, amely nem éri el a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> lenyomásakor, vagy ha a PAGE DOWN billentyűt nélkül, és megfelel-e egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageDownCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the page button to the right of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageRightCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A vízszintes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a mozgás akkor történik, ha a lap jobb oldalán gombra a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> nélkül, és megfelel-e egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.PageRightCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*> position of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> helyezi át a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*>Helyezze a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the CTRL+END keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: Függőleges <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a mozgás akkor történik, ha a CTRL + END billentyűk lenyomásakor.

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToEndCommand"></xref> in a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToRightEndCommand"></xref> in a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A mozgás megfelel-e egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToEndCommand"> </xref> függőleges <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> és egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollToRightEndCommand"> </xref> vízszintes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a small distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, to the left for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or upward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> áthelyezése egy kis távolság értéke alapján <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, vízszintes balra <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> vagy felfelé függőleges <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the upper <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed or when the UP ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineUpCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Függőleges <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a mozgás akkor történik, ha a felső <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> nélkül, vagy ha a fel nélkül, és megfelel-e egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineUpCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the left <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineLeftCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A vízszintes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a mozgás akkor történik, ha a bal oldali <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> nélkül, és megfelel-e egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineLeftCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved a small distance, as determined by the value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, to the right for a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> or downward for a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> áthelyezése egy kis távolság értéke alapján <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>, a vízszintes jobb <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> vagy lefelé függőleges <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.SmallChange*>

trans-unit.source: For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the lower <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed or when the DOWN ARROW key is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineDownCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Függőleges <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a mozgás akkor történik, amikor a minél kisebb <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> nélkül, vagy amikor a le nyílbillentyű nélkül, és megfelel-e egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineDownCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, this movement occurs when the right <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"></xref> is pressed, and corresponds to a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineRightCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A vízszintes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a mozgás akkor történik, ha a jobb oldali <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RepeatButton"> </xref> nélkül, és megfelel-e egy <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.LineRightCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> moved to a new position because the user selected **Scroll Here** in the shortcut menu of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> áthelyezése egy új helyre, mert a felhasználó kiválasztott **görgetési Itt** a helyi menüben a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This movement corresponds to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollHereCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A mozgás megfelel-e a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.ScrollHereCommand"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To view the shortcut menu, right-click the mouse when the pointer is over the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A helyi menü megtekintéséhez kattintson a jobb gombbal az egérrel az egérmutató esetén a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> was dragged and caused a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> okozott és húzta a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"> </xref> esemény.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"></xref> event of this ScrollEventType may occur more than one time when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> is dragged in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar.Scroll"> </xref> eseményeket, a ScrollEventType fordulhat elő, több mint egy időpontot, amikor a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"> </xref> húzza a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Fel kell venni a párbeszédpanelre.
